name: Tracks (WaveParadigm)
description:
Play online here! http://waveparadigm.net/tracks

Candice is a new conductor, helping with shipments from Products Inc. Will she run into any trouble along the way, and will philosophy degree help her?

Tracks was made during a 48-hour Game Jam for the Stevens Game Development Club. The Jam can be found here.

Character Design, Logo, Art - Ari Fiekowsky
